article.title: Rockwell Collins to Develop Close Air Support System Software
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Rockwell Collins Network Enabling Software, Poway, Calif., is being awarded a potential $9,867,366 Â cost-plus-fixed-fee, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity for software development, support, maintenance, product improvement, sustainment of ground and air interoperability and post-deployment support of the Air Force Tactical Air Control Party-Close Air Support System at Hanscom Air Force Base, Mass. The Naval Surface Warfare Center, Crane, Ind., is the contracting activity.
